title: SMC_AxisDistanceTransition (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_AxisDistanceTransition
Sets the transition parameters for distance based blending in axis space
(transition mode
MC_TRANSITION_MODE.TMAxisDistance
).
The outputs can be connected to the inputs
TransitionMode
and
TransitionParameter
of the movement function blocks.

rows.Name: LinearDistance
rows.Comment: The linear distance in user units. Must be non-negative.

rows:
The rotary distance in angular degrees. Must be non-
negative.

Defines which axes are taken into account for axis distance
based blending.
The submode, determines how the distances are interpreted.

rows.Name: TransitionMode
rows.Comment:
Can be connected to the input TransitionMode of the movement
function block.

rows:
Can be connected to the TransitionParameter input
of the movement function block.
